text: man-il han yeoseong-i nampyeon-eulobuteo hagdaewa naebeolim-eulo dulyeowo hal ttae geu dul saie hwahaeleul sikim-eun joeag-i anini hwahaega choeseon-ila bilog namseong-ui mulsim-e uihan geos-ila do geuleohanila geuleona neohuiga seon gwa jeong-uileul silcheonhandamyeon hananim-eun neohuiga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul algo gye sinila
